channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientEMS, FortiClientWindows, FortiClientLinux, FortiClientMac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiClientEMS, FortiClientWindows, FortiClientLinux, FortiClientMac

item.title: CVE-2021-41028|2024-08-04T02:59:30.977Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20forticlientems%2C%20forticlientwindows%2C%20forticlientlinux%2C%20forticlientmac
item.description: A combination of a use of hard-coded cryptographic key vulnerability [CWE-321] in FortiClientEMS 7.0.1 and below, 6.4.6 and below and an improper certificate validation vulnerability [CWE-297] in FortiClientWindows, FortiClientLinux and FortiClientMac 7.0.1 and below, 6.4.6 and below may allow an unauthenticated and network adjacent attacker to perform a man-in-the-middle attack between the EMS and the FCT via the telemetry protocol.
